CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(clofor_com_cfs__MultiTransitRequired__c) <> 'No',
(TEXT(YEAR( clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ))+IF( LEN(TEXT( MONTH(clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ) ))=1 ,'0'+TEXT( MONTH(clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ) ),TEXT( MONTH(clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ) ))+ IF( LEN(TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ))=1 ,'0'+TEXT( DAY( clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ) ),TEXT( DAY( clofor_com_cfs__T_ETD__c ) )))
,(TEXT(YEAR( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ))+IF( LEN(TEXT( MONTH(clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) ))=1 ,'0'+TEXT( MONTH(clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) ),TEXT( MONTH(clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) ))+ IF( LEN(TEXT( DAY( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) ))=1 ,'0'+TEXT( DAY( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) ),TEXT( DAY( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) ))))
CustomField.label: ETD AFR
